name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Developer Engineer with a strong focus on object-oriented development and expertise in **C#**, **Java**, and relational database management. Proven ability to implement ERP solutions and leverage **ServiceNow** for process optimization. Demonstrates exceptional analytical skills and customer orientation, ensuring alignment of technology solutions with user needs. Recognized for excellent documentation and communication abilities, fostering effective team collaboration and contributing to a flexible, problem-solving environment. With 13+ years of experience in building high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors, I bring a unique blend of technical proficiency and original strengths including hands-on expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Proficient in both frontend and backend development leveraging frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in developing AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing, as well as deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure** while implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines.

Employed object-oriented development principles to create scalable and maintainable codebases, contributing to improved software performance and team efficiency.
Documented all development processes comprehensively, providing clear guidelines for maintenance and future development, thereby enhancing team collaboration and knowledge sharing.
Demonstrated strong analytical skills by troubleshooting and debugging complex issues, utilizing relational databases to optimize data access and manipulation.
Cultivated exceptional customer orientation through regular communication and feedback loops, ensuring alignment with client requirements and high-quality deliverables.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to ensure flexibility in development processes and to accommodate shifting project scopes and timelines, driving project success.
Implemented robust problem-solving strategies to navigate technical challenges, contributing to efficient project execution and timely delivery of solutions.

Utilized strong analytical skills to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Employed object-oriented development principles to build interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Demonstrated exceptional communication by delivering real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance for over **50,000** daily transactions.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing, effectively handling data from **10+** sources.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns, achieving **90%** accuracy in predictions.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, supporting up to **1,000** concurrent requests.
